name: react-native-switch-audio-output-android-normal-mode
title: React Native Switch Audio Output Source (for Android) with MODE_NORMAL
description: Library for selecting audio output source (for Android). Uses Android's AudioManager class. Sets AudioManager's mode to MODE_NORMAL which outputs sound through 'media' instead of 'calling'. Forked from https://github.com/anttivuor/react-native-switch-audio-output-android
